summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2454, for the improvement of Shilshole Avenue, from 15th Avenue Northwest to 17th Avenue Northwest, and 17th Avenue Northwest from Shilshole Avenue to West 47th Street, all in the City of Seattle, by replanking the same; under Ordinance No. 26291 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
